original: tasmādevamatha grantho vijñeyaḥ- kasmādanumānameva dvidhā bhi- dyate na pratyakṣamiti pṛṣṭe kāraṇamāha- grāhyabhedādityādi |
analyzed: tasmāt evam atha granthaḥ vijñeyaḥ kasmāt anumānam eva dvidhā bhi dyate na pratyakṣam iti pṛṣṭe kāraṇam āha grāhya bhedāt ityādi

original: yadi grāhyabhedādanumānaṁ dvighā bhidyate evaṁ sati pratyakṣamapi dvidhā bhidye- tetyāha- svalakṣaṇamanirdeśyamiti |
analyzed: yadi grāhya bhedāt anumāna dvighā bhidyate eva sati pratyakṣam api dvidhā sva lakṣaṇam anirdeśyam iti

original: etaduktaṁ bhavati- īdṛśamidaṁ pratyakṣānumānayorgrāhyamiṣyate yatraikaṁ nirdeśyamanyadanirdeśyamiti |
analyzed: etat ukta bhavati īdṛśam idam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ grāhyam iṣyate yatra eka nirdeśyam anyat anirdeśyam iti

original: tasmādanumānameva dvidhā bhidyate yasya viṣayo vācā parasmai pratipā- dayituṁ śakyate na tu pratyakṣamiti ||
analyzed: tasmāt anumānam eva dvidhā bhidyate yasya viṣayaḥ vācā parasmai śakyate na tu pratyakṣam iti

original: nanu cārthas tu rūpaṁ cātulyametayorityanena prāgeva pramāṇayorviṣa- yabhedaḥ pratipāditas tadbhedāc ca svarūpabhedaḥ |
analyzed: nanu ca arthaḥ tu ca atulyam etayoḥ iti anena prāk eva pramāṇayoḥ viṣa ya bhedaḥ pratipāditaḥ tad bhedāt ca svarūpa bhedaḥ

original: tat kimidamupanya- stam- bhinnaṁ hi pratyakṣānumānayoḥ svātmavad grāhyamityādi |
analyzed: tat kim idam upanya stam bhinna hi pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ sva ātma vat grāhyam ityādi
pūrvam anya arthaḥ ayam arthaḥ uktaḥ idānīm anya arthaḥ iti adoṣaḥ
yadi ca ityādinā sva lakṣaṇasya anirdeśya tva pratipādayati

original: yathā rūpaṁ na pratyakṣato gṛhyata ityeva svalakṣaṇā- kāreṇa liṅgaṁ bhavati viśeṣasyānanvayāt api tu sāmānyākāreṇaiva pūrvadṛṣṭānusaṁhitena  #

original: tathā na sparśaḥ pūrvapratyakṣeṇa gṛhīta ityeva svala- kṣaṇato'numeyaḥ kiṁ tu sāmānyākāreṇaivānumānayogyeneti darśayati ||

original: tatrāyaṁ prayogaḥ- yo yataḥ siddhasattākādanyeṣāṁ na sambhāvyate vastudharmas tatra ca pramāṇenābādhitaḥ sa tasya bhavati |

original: tatra ca tūlopalapa- llavādiṣu tadbhāve'pi sparśabhedadarśanāt kvacid viśeṣasyāpi sambhavāc chaṅkayā bhāvyamiti sarvatrādarśanamātreṇāyuktaḥ  #

pratiṣedhaḥ

original: adṛṣṭebhyo'pi na yukta iti darśannāha- na hyadṛṣṭebhya ityādi |
analyzed: adṛṣṭebhyaḥ api na yuktaḥ iti darśan āha na hi adṛṣṭebhyaḥ ityādi
hi śabdaḥ samuccaya avadhāraṇe vā

original: abhighātasya vāyaṁ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadviparītasya vā vastuno vidhiḥ |

original: yadi pratiṣedhaḥ abhighātasparśaviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vyāpya- vyāpakabhāvo vā vācyaḥ yato hetuvyāpakāveva nivartamānau svaprati- baddhe  #
analyzed: yadi pratiṣedhaḥ abhighāta sparśa viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ vā vācyaḥ yatas hetu vyāpakau eva nivartamānau sva prati baddhe

original: kāryakāraṇavyā- pyavyāpakabhāvau ca na sidhyataḥ vināpyabhighātena sparśaviśeṣasya bhāvādarthāntaratvāc ca |

atha a mūrtimatām anabhighātāt iti anena anabhi

original: ghātākhyaṁ vastvevocyate paryudāsavṛttyā tasya tarhi vyomādhibhiḥ sambandhaḥ sādhyaḥ sparśaviśeṣeṇa ca virodhaḥ |

original: anyathā kathaṁ tadasa- mbaddhamaviruddhaṁ ca tenaitat tatra bādhata atiprasanṅgo vā ||

original: tathā hi- teṣu tasya vṛttirvā sambandhaḥ syāt tajjanyatā vā |

original: na tāvad vṛttiḥ sidhyati teṣāmatī- ndriyatvāt |

original: na hyanvayamātrāt kāraṇasya sāmarthyaṁ gamyate api tu vyatirekādapi |

original: sa ceha nāsti nityatvāt sarvagata- tvāc ca vyomādināṁ tadabhāve tadabhāvāsambhavāt |

ayam api ahetuḥ avirodhāt

original: vibhutvaṁ nāma guṇo'numeyaḥ atha ca sukhādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ tathā mana- so'pyaṇutvamekatvaṁ cānumeyametadguṇadvayaṁ syāt ayaṁ ca sparśaḥ pratyakṣo  #

original: idānīṁ yadatra yuktam tat pratipādayitumāha- kiṁ tarhītyādi |

analyzed: punar dṛṣṭeṣu ca dṛṣṭa tvāt iti etat uktam yāvatā sa sparśa viśeṣaḥ dṛṣṭeṣu api na eva dṛṣṭaḥ
na eṣa doṣaḥ
dṛṣṭeṣu tāvat sparśa sāmānya sambhavat viśeṣa dṛṣṭam

original: yo yatra dṛṣṭasāmānyaḥ sa tatra sambhavati |

original: atha vā yo yatra dṛṣṭaḥ sa tatra sambhavadviśeṣaḥ |

yathā āmalakeṣu rasaḥ

ubhayatra ca ābādhake sati iti draṣṭavyam

original: yadyevaṁ niścayena bhavitavyam- atrai- vāyaṁ sambhavatīti |
analyzed: yadi eva niścayena bhavitavyam atrai vāya sambhavati iti

analyzed: tasmāt na aya dṛṣṭeṣu sambhavati iti atas āha teṣām ca ityādi

original: anekatvāt saṁśayaḥ na tu tatrāsambha- vādityarthaḥ ||

original: daśamam tasmād yasyāyaṁ sparśaḥ sa vāyurityevaṁ pṛthivyādibhyo'nyasya daśamāder dra- vyasya pṛthivyādeś cānyasya pratiṣedhena vāyusattvamavagacchati

ra ṇa tvāt

yathā eva tava sāmā

original: na tu sattvādibhiḥ sādhāraṇairākārairasādhāraṇena vā rūpeṇeti manyate ||

original: vṛkṣaśa- bdārtho yaḥ sa śabdāntarasyārtho na bhavati |

original: atrāpi vṛkṣaśabdārthasya śabdāntarānabhidhe- yatāṁ darśayatā śabdāntarārthavyāvṛttyupalakṣitaṁ vṛkṣatvamātraṁ vṛkṣaśabda- syārtha ityuktaṁ  #

nanu ca dravya śabdena api śākhā ādimān arthaḥ pratyāyyate

original: tataś cāsārupye'pyabhidheyatvadarśanān na śabdasārūpyeṇā- rthapratyāyanamityata āha- yadyapītyādi |

apiśabdena dravya śabdaḥ vyabhicārāt avācakaḥ eva
abhyupetya tu uttaram ucyate iti artha m āviṣkaroti
rūpa antaram ākāra antaram tasya eva vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgaḥ

original: tat (23) punā rūpāntaramadravyanivṛttyopalakṣyata iti darśayitumidamuktam- adravyanivṛttyeti ||

original: na kevalaṁ dravyaśabdenādravyanivṛttyupalakṣitaṁ vastuno rūpāntaraṁ dravyaśabdasārupyaprāptiyogyaṁ gamyate api tu vṛkṣaśabde- nāpi |
analyzed: na kevala dravya śabdena adravya nivṛtti upalakṣita vastunaḥ rūpa antara dravya śabda sārupya prāpti yogya gamyate api tu vṛkṣa śabde na api

original: tathā hi- sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ dṛśyate- dravyaṁ vṛkṣa iti |
analyzed: tathā hi sāmānādhikaraṇya dṛśyate dravya vṛkṣa iti

original: na ca tena saha tasya sārūpyamiṣyate |
analyzed: na ca tena saha tasya sārūpyam iṣyate

original: tataḥ sa eva doṣaḥ asārūpye'pi śabdārthatvadarśanāt |

vṛkṣa śabda arthāt evā a dravya nivṛtti avinābhā vinaḥ sā pratīyate

original: mūḍhas tu śabdādeva gamyata iti manyate |
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ tu śabdāt eva gamyate iti manyate

original: sāmā- nādhikaraṇyaṁ tu viśeṣasahitasya viśeṣe vartamānatvāt |

na tu vṛkṣa śabdena adravya nivṛttiḥ abhidhīyate

original: suba- ntānyeva padāni yadi śabdanibandhane pramāṇa ucyeran na syād doṣaḥ |
analyzed: sup a ntāni eva padāni yadi śabda nibandhane pramāṇe ucyeran na syāt doṣaḥ

original: tathā hi- teṣāṁ pariniṣpannarūpo'rtha idaṁ taditi pratyavamarśa- yogyo buddhau sanniviśata iti tena sahābhedopacāraḥ sambhavati śabdasya |

na tu nāma padāni eva pariniṣpanna artha abhidhāyīni ucyante
ki tarhi
taṅ antāni api yat āha ākhyāta śabdaiḥ api ityādi

original: ākhyā- taśabdaiḥ pacati paṭhatītyevamādibhiraliṅgāsaṅkhyā pūrvāparībhūtāvayavā pariniṣpannasvarūpā kriyocyate |
analyzed: ākhyā ta śabdaiḥ pacati paṭhati iti evamādibhiḥ aliṅgā asaṅkhyā pūrva aparībhūta avayavā pariniṣpanna svarūpā kriyā ucyate

original: na ca tathāvidhasyārthasyedaṁ tadityagṛ- hītasya buddyā śakyo'bhedopacāraḥ kartum |
analyzed: na ca tathāvidhasya arthasya idam tat iti agṛ hītasya buddyā śakyaḥ bheda upacāraḥ kartum
na api pariniṣpanna rūpaḥ śabda ātmā śādyamāna ākāra tā pratipadyate
ca vākyam eva śabdaḥ iti
tena arthasya śabdanāt

original: yadi vākya- meva śabdaḥ padānāmupādānaṁ kimarthamityāha- tadadhigamopāyaś cetyādi |
analyzed: yadi vākyam meva śabdaḥ padānām upādāna kimartham iti āha tad adhigama upāyaḥ ca ityādi

original: vākyārtho hi bāhyo vā syāt sādhyasādhanasamba- ndhātmā sādhanaśaktiniveśāanugṛhītā niravayavā kriyā vā ānta- ro va pratibhālakṣaṇaḥ ||

original: na ca tathābhūtenārthena so'yamityabhedopacāraḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti ||

original: (25) yadi tarhi na bhidyate tvayā cāgamikatvaṁ vāyvādīnāṁ pratipādayatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṁ śābdasya pratipāditam evaṁ satyāgamānumānayo-  #

original: tannirapekṣa eva sa yasmād vāyoḥ sattāṁ sādhayati |

original: tataś ca ye codayanti- liṅgādijñānasya pratyakṣānumānānantarbhāvāt pramāṇāntaratvaṁ prāpnotīti te jāḍyamevātmanaḥ khyāpayanti ||

original: sāmānyarūpeṇaiva prakāśayati na viśeṣarūpeṇa dīptādinā tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye vidhināpi tadevāsya rūpaṁ dṛṣṭamiti gamyate na viśeṣarūpam  #
analyzed: sāmānya rūpeṇa eva prakāśayati na viśeṣa rūpeṇa dīpta ādinā tasmāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhaye vidhinā api tat eva asya dṛṣṭam iti gamyate na viśeṣa rūpam
kārya kāraṇa vyavahāra siddhi hetu tvena iti abhiprayaḥ

original: na hi dīptādiviśeṣadarśanaṁ kāryakāraṇavyavahārasiddhihetuḥ tadabhāve'pi dhū- masya darśanāt |
analyzed: na hi dīpta ādi viśeṣa darśana kārya kāraṇa vyavahāra siddhi hetuḥ tad abhāve pi dhū masya darśanāt

original: aṁśena janyajanakabhāva iti cet na tajjanyaviśe- ṣagrahaṇe'bhimatatvāt sarvathā janyajanakabhāvasya |
analyzed: aśena janya janaka bhāvaḥ iti ced na tad janya viśe ṣa grahaṇa ibhimata tvāt sarvathā janya janaka bhāvasya

original: tasya ca prativyakti sarvātmanā parisamāptatvādekasyāmevāgni- vyaktau darśanopapattiḥ |

atra api ayam eva prayogaḥ vācyaḥ

original: athaikāśrayagrahaṇe'pi samastaṁ gṛhyate evaṁ sati tasya pratyekaṁ sarvātmanā parisamāptatvādguṇavadanekatvaṁ syāt |
analyzed: atha eka āśraya grahaṇe pi samasta gṛhyate eva sati tasya pratyekam sarva ātmanā parisamāpta tvāt guṇavat anekatva syāt

original: pūrvavadityatra vatipakṣe viṣāṇādiliṅgena gavā- rthānumāne samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ |
analyzed: pūrvavat iti atra vati pakṣe viṣāṇa ādi liṅgena gavā rtha anumāne samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ
sa ca iha buddhi liṅga avaseyaḥ varṇyate

original: iha- buddheś ca tena sambandhāsiddheḥ pratibandhābhāvāc cāliṅgayoga iti na tataḥ sa sidhyati |
analyzed: iha buddheḥ ca tena sambandha asiddheḥ pratibandha abhāvāt ca a liṅga yogaḥ iti na tatas sa sidhyati

original: tataś ca sāsnāder liṅgād gavārthānumānaṁ na syāt |
analyzed: tatas ca sāsnā ādeḥ liṅgāt na syāt
tat ca dṛṣṭam

original: tathā hi- ekasāmagyradhīnasāsnādyavayavā- tmako gauriti yuktyā vimṛśanto'vinābhāvaṁ niścitya sāsnāder li- ṅgād gavārthe'numānaṁ kurvanti |
analyzed: tathā hi eka sāmagyḥ adhīna sāsnādi avayava ātmakaḥ gauḥ iti yuktyā niścitya sāsnādeḥ ṅgāt kurvanti
dhūmāt agni anumāne sayogaḥ sambandhaḥ
tasya api a grahaṇe pratītiḥ na syāt
sā ca dṛṣṭā
tathā hi dhūma mātra dṛṣṭvā agniḥ avinābhāva niścaya pūrvakam anumīyate

original: na ca tadāgṛhītasakalāśra- yo'nekārthasādhāraṇatvād dvitvādivat saṁyogaḥ paricchidyate ||
analyzed: na ca tadā agṛhīta sakala āśra yaḥ na eka artha sādhāraṇa tvāt dvi tva ādi vat sayogaḥ paricchidyate

original: (69) matuppakṣe tu meghādīnāṁ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saha samba- ndhaḥ ||
analyzed: tu megha ādīnām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vṛṣṭi ādibhiḥ saha samba

original: śeṣavatyapi ced vatiriti vatipakṣe rūpasya rasenaikārthasamavāya ityete yathoktāḥ |
analyzed: śeṣavatī api ced vatiḥ iti vati pakṣe rūpasya rasena eka artha samavāyaḥ iti ete yathā uktāḥ
anta ipadiṣṭa tvāt iti
śeṣavati matup pakṣaḥ vicā rasya antar tatra apadiṣṭa tvāt asya
kāraṇa tva ādīnām ca sambandhi tve iti

original: kāraṇatvādīnāṁ kāryatvādi- bhiḥ saha liṅgaliṅgabhāvena sambandha iṣyamāṇe kāraṇatvādeḥ kāryatvādi- mātrāpekṣatvāt tato liṅgini kāryatvādyākārameva  #
analyzed: kāraṇa tva ādīnā kārya tva ādi bhiḥ saha liṅga liṅga bhāvena sambandhe iṣyamāṇe kāraṇa tva ādeḥ kārya tva ādi mātra apekṣa tvāt tatas liṅgini kārya tva ādi ākāram eva
jñāna syāt na vṛ ṣṭi ādi ākāram
ki kāraṇam iti āha sambandha mātra dvāreṇa ityādi

original: na hi sambandhamantareṇa liṅgāl liṅgijñānam utpadyate |
analyzed: na hi sambandham antareṇa liṅgāt liṅgi jñānam utpadyate

original: liṅgaṁ ca yathā yena saha sambaddham tathā tameva gamayati nānyamanyathā mā bhūdati- prasaṅga iti |
analyzed: ca yathā yena saha sambaddham tathā tam eva gamayati na anyam anyathā mā bhūt ati prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: kāraṇatvādinā ca meghādayaḥ kāryatvādinā vṛṣṭyādīnāṁ sa- mbaddhā iti tanmātragatiḥ syāt ||
analyzed: kāraṇa tva ādinā ca megha ādayaḥ kārya tva ādinā vṛṣṭi ādīnām sa mbaddhāḥ iti tanmātra gatiḥ syāt

original: (70) syādetat- sarvātmanā teṣāṁ kāryakāraṇabhāvādayaḥ sambandhāḥ nāṁśena |
analyzed: syāt etat sarva ātmanā kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādayaḥ sambandhāḥ nāśena

analyzed: tatas yama prasaṅgaḥ viśeṣāṇām api sambandhi tvāt iti āha

original: sthūlabindukā vṛṣṭiraśanimatītyādyapi grahaṇaṁ syāt evamādibhirapyākāraiḥ saha kāraṇakāryādibhāvāt |
analyzed: sthūla bindukā vṛṣṭiḥ aśanimatī ityādi api syāt evamādibhiḥ api ākāraiḥ saha kāraṇa kārya ādi bhāvāt

original: asmākaṁ tu yadyapi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ tathāpi nāyaṁ prasaṅgaḥ tathā ni- ścetumaśakyatvāt |
analyzed: tu yadi api sarvathā janya janaka bhāvaḥ tathā api na aya prasaṅgaḥ tathā

original: parasya ca niścayātmakaṁ pratyakṣamiṣṭaṁ tadviṣayaś cā- navayavaḥ |
analyzed: parasya ca tad viṣayaḥ

original: tato yadi tad gṛhṇāti sarvathā tena sa grāhyo na vā katha- ñcidityuktam |
analyzed: tatas yadi tat gṛhṇāti sarvathā tena sa grāhyaḥ na vā kathaṃcid iti uktam
atas doṣaḥ

original: pūrvatra ye'bhihitā doṣāḥ- sambandhāntarato gatiḥ kāryamātrādyanu- mānaṁ sarvākāragrahaṇaṁ cetyādayaḥ tān sāmānyato dṛṣṭe'pyatideṣṭumā- ha-  #
analyzed: pūrvatra doṣāḥ sambandha antarataḥ gatiḥ sarva ākāra grahaṇa ca ityādayaḥ tān sāmānyatas dṛṣṭe pi atideṣṭum ā ha
sāmānya dṛṣṭam api evam iti
katham iti āha tat api hi ityādi

original: kas tarhi pūrvābhyāṁ tasya viśeṣa ityāha- atyantaparokṣa iti ||
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi pūrvābhyā tasya viśeṣaḥ iti āha atyanta parokṣaḥ iti
sarvatra ca iti pūrvavat ādiṣu triṣu api
pūrvavat śeṣavat iti bruvatā anume pramāṇam uktam
tat eva ca artha adhigamaḥ
na ca anyat phalam asti
ca abhyupeta hānam
syāt etat hāna upādāna apekṣā buddhayaḥ phalam iti
na etat asti tāsā hita ahita smaraṇa hetuka tvāt

original: na hi tadevedaṁ hitamahitaṁ cetyādyasmaratas tāḥ kasyacit samupajāyante |
analyzed: na hi tat eva idam hitam ahita ca ityādi a smarataḥ tāḥ kasyacid samupajāyante
syāt etat phalam eva na abhyupetam iti āha na ca ityādi

original: yat karaṇam tat ka- rmaṇi kriyāphalam paraśuvat |
analyzed: yat karaṇam tat ka rmaṇi kriyāphalam paraśu vat
tathā ca anumānam
svabhāvaḥ
siddha sādhya tām āśaṅkya āha liṅga jñānam ityādi

original: vyapadeśo na sidhyatīti yasmādanumeyameva mukhyaṁ pūrvavaccheṣava- t jñānaṁ tūpacāreṇa |
analyzed: vyapadeśaḥ na sidhyati iti yasmāt anumeyam eva
tad viṣaya tvāt tathā vyapadiśyate iti varṇitam

original: na ca liṅgajñānaṁ tadviṣayam yatas tathā vyapadeśo'sya syāt liṅga- sya pūrvavaccheṣavattvenāsaṁvarṇitatvāc chāstra ityabhyupetahāniḥ ||
analyzed: na ca liṅga jñāna tad viṣayam yatas tathā vyapadeśaḥ syāt liṅga śāstre iti abhyupeta hāniḥ
yat ca ityādinā api abhyupeta hānim eva āha

original: tathā hi- tatraivoktam- ekaikasya vā traividhyajñāpanārthamuktaṁ trividhamiti |
analyzed: tathā hi tatra eva uktam ekaikasya vā traividhya jñāpana artham ukta trividham iti
kaḥ hetuḥ
ayam eva traikālya grahaṇāt iti
idam api na eva upapadyate
na agatasya eva kāryasya grahaṇāt
na api śeṣavataḥ anāgata anumāna asaṃbhavāt
na hi prāk kāraṇāt kārya sambhavaḥ usti

original: pakṣilas tvāha- dravyādipadārthapratiṣedhāc chabde guṇatvasampratipa- ttiḥ śeṣavaditi |
analyzed: pakṣilaḥ tu āha dravya ādi padārtha pratiṣedhāt śabde guṇa tva sampratipa ttiḥ śeṣavat iti

original: atrāpi sambandhānirdeśādanumānatvameva tasya durla- bham kutaḥ punas traividhyam |
analyzed: atra api sambandha anirdeśāt anumāna tvam eva tasya durla bham kutas punar traividhyam
pratipādita prapañcena śabda guṇa tvasya a pi āgamika tvam āpta sañjñā vidhānena ityādinā
tatas na śabde guṇa tva pratipattiḥ anumāna
na ca tatra vatau iti
pūrvavati anumāne sambandha nirdeśaḥ eva na asti
atas tasya anumāna tvam anirdiṣṭam eva iti kutas sya traividhyam

original: na hi pūrve- ṇa tulyamityākāramātranirdeśān nirdiṣṭaṁ bhavati smṛtyādiṣvapi pū- rvadad grahaṇāt |

original: tathā śeṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa tulyamityatrāpi naiva samba- ndho nirdiṣṭa iti |
analyzed: tathā śeṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa tulyam iti atra api nā eva samba ndhaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ iti

asya sambandhaḥ yogiṇā pratyakṣa jñāna vi dhiḥ uktaḥ

āha kim idam laiṅgika nāma iti
ucyate ca

original: tatra yat sākṣādālocanamarthānāṁ yathā gaurevāyamaśca evāyamiti tat pra- tyakṣam |

yat tu anyat ālocya anyasya anugamanam tat no laiṅgikam

original: ta- sya tvatiprasajyamānasya liṅgaliṅginiyamāya sāmayiko lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ kriyate |

tat yathā asya idam ityādi
asya iti liṅgam āha idam iti anumeyam

original: yadā kha- lvasyedaṁ prasiddhamasandigghaṁ ca bhavati- asya kāraṇasya jñāpane bhā- vane va samarthasyedaṁ vyaṅgyamabhinirvartyaṁ vā kāryamiti  #
analyzed: yadā kha lu asya idam prasiddham asandigdha ca bhavati asya kāraṇasya jñāpane samarthasya idam vyaṅgyam abhinirvartya vā kāryam iti

original: athāsya kāra- ṇālocanādagṛhyamāṇe'pi kārye'nuvyavasāyo bhavati yathā dinakaro- dayadarśanād ghaṭābhivyaktau |
analyzed: atha asya kāra ṇa ālocanāt agṛhyamāṇe pi kārye nuvyavasāyaḥ bhavati yathā dinakaraḥ daya darśanāt ghaṭa abhivyaktau

original: tantūn vātānavitānāvasthitāṁs tantu- vāyādhiṣṭhātān dṛṣṭvā bhāvini paṭe ||

original: (74) evam- yadāsyedaṁ prasiddhamasandigdhaṁ ca bhavati- asya kāryasya vyaṅgyasya nirvartyasya vedaṁ kāraṇamiti athāsya kāryālocanādi- tyādi  #

original: tatra kāraṇasyaikārthasamavāya ekasthārtheṣu samavā- yaḥ kāryasya punarekasminnarthānāṁ samavāya iti vigrahabhedāt |

original: tatra kāryāt kāryāntare'numānam tad yathā rūpāt sparśe kāraṇāt kāraṇāntare tad yathā pādāt pāṇau ||

original: virodhi caturvidham- abhūtaṁ bhutasya tad yathāvidyamānaṁ va- rṣakarma sato vāyvabhrasaṁyogasya tasmin sati varṣakarmābhāvāt |

original: tathā hi- sahakāriṇiḥ prakāśādupādānāpekṣāj jñānajananayo- gyakṣaṇāntarotpattireva ghaṭādīnāṁ vyaktiḥ anyathānapekṣa tatkṛ- tamupakāraṁ jñānotpādanaprasaṅgāt

original: jñānajananasāmarthyamabhivyaktiriti cet evaṁ tarhi ghaṭādirevābhi- vyañjakena kriyata ityāpannam sāmarthyasya tadātmabhūtatvāt arthā- ntaratve  #

original: yathā hi kāraṇāt kāryaṁ pa- ricchidya tadarthaṁ pravartamānā vipralabhyamānā dṛśyante |

original: dvitīye tu pakṣe kāraṇameva tan na bhavatīti niścaye sati kutas tataḥ kāryasambhavānu- (77) mānam |

original: na hi śītasyāgnira hetur na bhavatīti niścaye sati kaścid- gninā śītasambhavo'numīyate |

sayogaḥ na āgatau siddheḥ iti

tat yathā jalasya analaḥ
agṛhīte api ca agni dhūma sayoge dahana anumitiḥ bhavati

original: kathaṁ punas tadagatau siddhirityāha- dṛṣṭo hītyādi |
analyzed: punar tad agatau siddhiḥ iti āha dṛṣṭaḥ hi ityādi

original: anu- mānakāle cāśrayasya sarvasyādarśanāt saṁyogasya grahaṇaṁ na sambhavatye- va |

original: ārūpaṁ dṛṣṭveti īṣadrupaṁ dṛṣṭvā saṁsthānamātraṁ dṛṣṭvetyarthaḥ ||
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā iti dṛṣṭvā sa sthāna mātra dṛṣṭvā iti arthaḥ

original: evaṁ ceṣyamāṇa iti sāmānyato gṛhītasya punar viśeṣeṇa grahaṇa iṣyamāṇe |
analyzed: eva ca iṣyamāṇe iti sāmānyatas gṛhītasya punar viśeṣeṇa grahaṇe iṣyamāṇe
svārtha ālocana mātra tvāt iti śabda ādi sva lakṣaṇa anubhava mātra tvāt iti arthaḥ
mātra śabdaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa grahaṇa nirāsa arthaḥ
na hi śrotra ādi vṛtteḥ ityādi
hi sāmānya viśeṣau

original: ato 'rthāntarāpekṣayāsyānena sārūpyamasya vāto viśeṣa iti bhavati |
analyzed: atas ṛtha antara apekṣayā asya anena sārūpyam asya vātaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti bhavati

original: na ca śrotrādivṛtterevaṁ grahaṇe sāmarthyam avikalpakatvāditi nendriyavṛ- tteḥ sāmānyaṁ viśeṣo vā viṣayaḥ |
analyzed: na ca śrotra ādi vṛtteḥ eva grahaṇe sāmarthyam avikalpaka tvāt iti na indriya vṛ tteḥ sāmānya viśeṣaḥ vā viṣayaḥ
ayathārtha tvāt iti sāmānya viṣayāyāḥ indriya dhiyaḥ

original: tathā hyuktam - sāmānyataḥ khalvapi pratyakṣaṁ cānavadhāritaṁ ceti |
analyzed: tathā hi uktam sāmānyatas khalu api

original: saiva viśeṣya vaktavyeti yathārthā śrotrādivṛttiḥ pratyakṣamiti |
analyzed: sā eva viśeṣya vaktavyā iti yathārthā śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam iti
yathā anyatra iti nyāya sūkṣme

original: evaṁ hyucyamāne pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṁ cādoṣaṁ bhavatīha ca viśeṣaṇaṁ na (97)
analyzed: eva hi ucyamāne pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa ca adoṣa bhavati iha ca viśeṣaṇa na
jāyate anavadhāritasya liṅgasya apratyakṣa tvāt eva aliṅga tva prasa ṅgāt

original: atra kecidāhuḥ - yadyapi svārthālocanamātratvaṁ pratyakṣasya tathāpi naiva sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣayatvābhāvaḥ śabdāderanarthāntaratvāt sāmānya- viśeṣayoḥ  #
analyzed: atra kecid āhuḥ yadi api svārtha ālocana mātra tva pratyakṣasya tathā api na eva sāmānya viśeṣa viṣaya tva abhāvaḥ śabda ādeḥ anartha antara tvāt sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ  /
sarvathā eva śabda ādeḥ indriya viṣaya tvāt iti
tat ayuktam sva vi ṣaya viniveśa vyāghāta prasaṅgāt

original: yac chabdavṛtti sāmānyam tadeva rūpādāvapi vartate |
analyzed: yat śabda vṛtti sāmānyam tat eva rūpa ādau api vartate

original: yathā ca tac chabdādananyat evaṁ rūpāderapīti tasya śrotravṛttyā grahaṇe rūpāderapi grahaṇamanuṣajyate |
analyzed: yathā ca tat śabdāt ananyat eva rūpa ādeḥ api iti tasya śrotra vṛttyā grahaṇe rūpa ādeḥ api grahaṇam anuṣajyate

original: anekasmāc ca rūpāderananyatvāt sāmānyasyānekatvaṁ rūpādīnāṁ ca tata ekasmādana- nyatvādekatvamiti ||
analyzed: anekasmāt ca rūpa ādeḥ ananya tvāt sāmānyasya aneka tva rūpa ādīnām ca tatas ekasmāt ana nya tvāt eka tvam iti
pratyakṣa phala pratyakṣam iti

original: yaduktam- evaṁ ceṣyamāṇa ityādi tasyāyaṁ parihāraḥ vikalpikatvān manovṛtteḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣaya- tvāt |
analyzed: eva ceṣyamāṇaḥ ityādi parihāraḥ vikalpika tvāt manaḥ vṛtteḥ sāmānya viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt
tat api ayuktam iti

original: pratyakṣaphalatvaṁ yadi manovṛtteḥ syāt syāt tathāvyapadeśaḥ |
analyzed: yadi manaḥ vṛtteḥ syāt syāt tathā vyapadeśaḥ
tat ca na asti bhinna viṣaya tvāt
etat ca prāk eva u ktam
tasmāt ayukta pratyakṣa śabda vyapadeśya tvam

original: tad darśayati- na cānyasyetyādi pratyakṣāt tatphalād vānyasya viṣayopacārahetvabhā- vāt ||
analyzed: tat darśayati na ca anyasya ityādi pratyakṣāt tad phalāt vā anyasya viṣaya upacāra hetu abhā vāt

original: (98) atha vā kecidevaṁ vyācakṣate - ekasmāt pratyakṣāditi pratyakṣaśa- bdo'yaṁ prasiddhatvamupalakṣayati |
analyzed: atha vā kecid eva vyācakṣate ekasmāt pratyakṣāt iti pratyakṣa śabdaḥ yaḥ prasiddha tvam upalakṣayati
pratyakṣāt prasiddhāt iti arthaḥ

original: tena pratya- kṣāt pratyakṣaphalāc cānyasyāpi jñānasya viṣaye liṅge pratyakṣavyapade- śo bhaviṣyatīti |
analyzed: tena kṣāt pratyakṣa phalāt ca anyasya api jñānasya viṣaye liṅge pratyakṣa vyapade śaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
atas āha na ca anyasya ityādi

original: evaṁ manyate- prasiddhatvaṁ hi pramāṇena syāt pratyakṣādinā |
analyzed: eva manyate hi pramāṇena syāt pratyakṣa ādinā

original: tatra pratyakṣeṇa tāvat tan nopapadyate yathoktād vidhānāt |
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣeṇa tāvat tat na upapadyate yathā uktāt vidhānāt
anumānena api nā eva anavasthā pra saṅgāt

original: yena hi liṅgena dhūmo'numīyate tatsādhanāyāparaṁ liṅgamanve- ṣyam |
analyzed: yena hi liṅgena dhūmaḥ anumīyate tad sādhanāya apara liṅgam
tad siddhaye ipi aparam iti anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ
āgamaḥ api nā eva sadā liṅga grahaṇe vyāpriyate
na hi siddhānta samaya anāśritāḥ liṅgam āgamena paricchindanti

original: kaścidarthaḥ kasyacidindriyasya pratyakṣo bhavatīti bhāṣyavacanāc cāyuktametaditi ||
analyzed: kaścid arthaḥ kasyacid indriyasya pratyakṣaḥ bhavati iti bhāṣya vacanāt ca ayuktam etat iti

original: bhavatu nāma kathañcit pratyakṣavyapadeśa ityabhyupagamya doṣāntarābhi- dhitsayāha- idaṁ ca vaktavyamityādi |
analyzed: bhavatu nāma kathañcid pratyakṣa vyapadeśaḥ iti abhyupagamya doṣa antara abhi dhitsayā āha idam ca vaktavyam ityādi

original: svādeḥ sambandhinaḥ svatvādi- rūpeṇaiva vā grahaṇaṁ syād rūpāntareṇa vā |
analyzed: sva ādeḥ sambandhinaḥ sva tva ādi rūpeṇa eva vā syāt rūpa antareṇa vā

original: yadi svatvādirūpeṇa sva- mityevaṁ gṛhyate evaṁ sati svāmisambandhitvāt svasya svāminamanta- reṇa svatvānupapatter niyataṁ svāmyapekṣatvāl liṅgadarśanāt  #
analyzed: yadi sva tva ādi rūpeṇa sva miti eva gṛhyate eva sati svāmi sambandhi tvāt svasya svāminam antareṇa sva tva anupapatteḥ niyata svāmi apekṣa tvāt liṅga darśanāt
pūrvam eva svāmi pratipattyā bhāvyam
na hi anyathā asya idam svam iti eva grahaṇa bhavati

original: (99) tataś cottarakālaṁ sambandhasmaraṇamanarthakaṁ syāt svāminaḥ pūrvame- va siddhatvāc cheṣānupapatteḥ śeṣasiddheś cānumānatveneṣṭatvāt ||
analyzed: tatas ca uttara kāla sambandha smaraṇam anarthaka syāt svāminaḥ siddha tvāt śeṣa anupapatteḥ śeṣa siddheḥ ca anumāna tvena iṣṭa tvāt
atha anyathā ākāra antareṇa grahaṇam iṣṭam tat na uktam iti asampūrṇa tā lakṣaṇasya
liṅga grahaṇe tulyam iti

original: yadyavinābhāvitvena liṅgagrahaṇa- m avinābhāvitvaṁ ca pratiyogyantarāpekṣameveti prāgeva liṅgagrahaṇāt sādhyapratītyā bhāvyam evaṁ ca sādhye  #
analyzed: yadi avinābhāvi tvena liṅga grahaṇam avinābhāvi tva ca pratiyogi antara apekṣam eva iti prāk eva liṅga grahaṇāt sādhya pratītyā bhāvyam eva ca sādhye
pratiyogini siddhe sambandha sma raṇa ānarthakyam
atha anyathā tat na uktam iti samānam
na ta sya ityādi

original: anumeye sadbhāva iti vacanād dharmiṇi dhūmādeḥ sadbhāva- mātraṁ gṛhyate na tu sambandhitvam |
analyzed: anumeye sadbhāve iti vacanāt dharmiṇi dhūma ādeḥ sadbhāva mātra gṛhyate na tu sambandhi tvam

original: kadā tarhi tad gṛhyata ityāha- paścādityādi |
analyzed: kadā tarhi tat gṛhyate iti āha paścāt ityādi
avyutpannasya tad gateḥ iti sva svāmi sambandha ādi anabhijñasya śeṣa gateḥ iti arthaḥ
punar tad gatiḥ iti āha dṛṣṭaḥ hi ityādi

original: kāryakāraṇa- bhāve tu sambandhe yathā śāstre vibhajyate kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ tathaivāvyutpannatvamatra vivakṣitam na tu sarvatheti
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāve tu sambandhe yathā śāstre vibhajyate kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ tathā eva avyutpanna tvam atra vivakṣitam na tu sarvathā iti

original: śāstre hyekasyaiva vastunaḥ svarūpamavijahataḥ pariṇāmena kāryakāraṇabhāvo vyavasthāpyate |
analyzed: śāstre hi ekasya eva vastunaḥ svarūpam a vijahataḥ pariṇāmena kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vyavasthāpyate

original: ye'pi ca tathā kāryakāraṇabhāvasambandhaṁ na pratipadya- nte te'pi prakārāntareṇa taṁ pratipadyāvinābhāvitvamātropalambhā- danumeyaṁ niścinvanti
analyzed: ye api ca tathā kārya kāraṇa bhāva sambandha na pratipadya nte te api prakāra antareṇa ta pratipadya avinābhāvi tva mātra upalambhāḥ niścinvanti
śāstra dṛṣṭaḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na upapadyate eva

original: ekatve hi kārya- kāraṇayoridaṁ kāryamidaṁ kāraṇamityetadeva na syāt |
analyzed: eka tve hi kārya kāraṇayoḥ idam kāryam idam kāraṇam iti etat eva na syāt

original: athāsti tayoḥ kaścit svabhāvātiśayaḥ yenaivaṁ bhavati bhedaprasaṅgaḥ |
analyzed: atha asti tayoḥ kaścid svabhāva atiśayaḥ yena eva bhavati bheda prasaṅgaḥ

original: sattvādiṣvapi hi bhedavyavasthāyāḥ svabhāvabheda eva nibandhanam |
analyzed: sattva ādiṣu api hi bheda vyavasthāyāḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ eva nibandhanam

original: satyapi kāryakāra- ṇatvena bhede traiguṇyajātyabhedādaikyamiti cet |
analyzed: sati api kārya kāra ṇa tvena bhede traiguṇya jāti abhedāt aikyam iti ced
na kārya kāraṇa vyatirekeṇa traiguṇyasya an upalakṣaṇāt

original: na ca nityasya krameṇa yogapadyena vā pariṇāmaḥ sambhavati tat kutas tannibandhanā kāryakāraṇavyavasthe- tyalaṁ prasaṅgena ||
analyzed: na ca nityasya krameṇa yogapadyena vā pariṇāmaḥ sambhavati tat kutas tad nibandhanā kārya kāraṇa vyavasthe tyala prasaṅgena

original: syādetat - agṛhīte eva so'numitikāraṇamityāha - na cetyādi sugamam ||
analyzed: syāt etat agṛhīte eva saḥ numiti kāraṇam iti āha na ca ityādi sugamam
na ca avaśyam ityādi
nanu svāmī apekṣya eva svasya rūpa niṣpattiḥ
tat kutas vyabhicāraḥ

original: evaṁ manyate - anumitikāla eva vā svatvena gṛhītaṁ liṅgaṁ pratiyoginaṁ gamayet prāg vā sambandhagrahaṇakāle tathā paricchinnaṁ sadanumānakāle'nyathāpyupalabhyamānamiti
analyzed: eva manyate anumiti kāle eva vā sva tvena gṛhīta liṅga pratiyogina gamayet prāk vā sambandha grahaṇa kāle tathā paricchinna sat anumāna kāle nyathā api upalabhyamānam iti

original: yadyanumāna- kāla idamasya svamityevaṁ niścitaṁ gamakamiṣyate atrokto doṣaḥ- (101)
analyzed: yadi anumāna kāle idam asya svam iti eva niścita gamakam iṣyate atra uktaḥ doṣaḥ
svāmi sambandhāt sva tvam iti evamādinā
tasmāt dvitīya darśanam a bhyupeyāt
tatas ca vyabhicāraḥ

original: svasvāminoḥ paryāyeṇa viparyaya- bhāvasambhavān na śakyamevamanumānaṁ kartum- idaṁ mayā tasya prāk svatvena gṛhītam |
analyzed: sva svāminoḥ paryāyeṇa viparyaya bhāva sambhavāt na śakyam evam anumāna kartum idam mayā tasya prāk sva tvena gṛhītam

original: tasmād yatredaṁ tatrāsya tena svāminā bhavitavyami- ti vināpi pārthivādinā cchatrādeḥ kevalasyāsvāmikasya ca darśana- sambhavāditi |
analyzed: tasmāt yatra idam tatra asya tena svāminā bhavitavyam iti vinā api pārthiva ādinā chatra ādeḥ kevalasya asvāmikasya ca darśana sambhavāt iti
evam anyatra api yathāsambhava vyabhicāraḥ abhyūhyaḥ

original: syādetat - na sarvaṁ svasvāmibhāvādinā sambaddhaṁ gamakam |
analyzed: syāt etat na sarva sva svāmi bhāva ādinā sambaddha gamakam
ki ta rhi
yat avyabhicāri iti
atas āha na hi upalabdha sambandhasya id yādi

original: yadi yathokte sambandhe gṛhīte'pi liṅgasya punar vyabhicārya- vyabhicāritvamakṣyate tato'vinā bhāvitvamevānumitihetuḥ syā- t na svasvāmibhāvādayaḥ  #
analyzed: yadi yathā ukte sambandhe gṛhīte api liṅgasya punar vyabhicārya vyabhicāri tvam akṣyate tatas vinā bhāvi tvam eva anumiti hetuḥ syāt na sva svāmi bhāva ādayaḥ
sambandhāḥ
syāt etat avinābhāvaḥ anumiti hetuḥ

original: sa tu yathokte sambandhe sati bhavati |
analyzed: sa tu yathā ukte sambandhe sati bhavati
atas tad nirdeśaḥ iti
tat ayuktam tad bhāve api tad abhā vāt
sambandhasya aviśiṣṭa tvāt iti
dviṣṭaḥ hi nimitta naimittika samba ndhaḥ

original: sa caikatra yathā dvitīye'pītyubhayatra gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt ||
analyzed: sa ca ekatra yathā dvitīye pi iti ubhayatra gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt
vadhya vadhaka bhāvaḥ tu asambandhaḥ eva iti liṅga liṅginoḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: ata evāha - na hi tau liṅgaliṅgināviti |
analyzed: atas eva āha na hi tau liṅga liṅginau iti

original: itare sambandhāḥ parābhi- prāyeṇa liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambhavanti |
analyzed: itare sambandhāḥ parābhi prāyeṇa liṅga liṅginoḥ sambhavanti
vadhya vadhaka bhāvaḥ tu para matena api na sambhavati

original: ahinakulayor hi vadhyavadhakabhāvaḥ na ca tau liṅga- liṅgināviṣyete vyabhicārāt api tvahijayanakulaparājayau |
analyzed: ahi nakulayoḥ hi vadhya vadhaka bhāvaḥ na ca tau vyabhicārāt api tu ahi jaya nakula parājayau
na ca tayoḥ vadhya vadhaka bhāvaḥ
evam anyatra api iti kāka ulūka ādiṣu
yat punar avadhāritam ityādinā lakṣaṇa avyāpi tām āha pradhāna puru ṣa samprayoga pratipatti hetoḥ anumānasya asaṅgrahāt
anvaya ādibhiḥ iti
ādi śabdena parimāṇa kārya kāraṇa bhāva śakti pravṛtti vaiścarūpyāṇi gṛhyante
pradāna astitva ādi adhigamaḥ iti atra api ādi grahaṇena evatva arthavattva pārāḥ rthya ādayaḥ cūlikā arthāḥ

original: tadā katara iti saptasveko'pi na sambhava- tīti pṛcchati |
analyzed: tadā kataraḥ iti saptasu ekaḥ api na sambhava ti iti pṛcchati
cintyam iti dvaividhya sambhavāt
na pṛthak vācyaḥ iti

original: asti pradhānam bhedānāṁ darśanādityevaṁ vaktavya- m na tu bhedānāmanvayadarśanād iti ||
analyzed: asti pradhānam bhedānām darśanāt iti eva vaktavyam na tu bhedānām anvaya darśanāt iti

original: bhedā eva hi naimittikā iti utpādyatvāt |
analyzed: bhedāḥ eva hi naimittikāḥ iti utpādya tvāt
nimitta pradhāna miti utpādaka tvāt
ananyatvāt iti

original: anvayo'pi bhedānāmātmabhūtaḥ taddharmatvād dha- rmadharmiṇoś cānanyatvāt |
analyzed: anvayaḥ api bhedānām ātma bhūtaḥ tad dharma tvāt dha rma dharmiṇoḥ ca ananya tvāt
atas bheda vat tasya api naimittika tvam upapa nnam
eva parimāṇa ādīnām api veditavyam
na pañcadhā iti

original: bhedātmabhūtatvādanvayādīnāṁ bhedā evaiko vītaḥ syā- t ||
analyzed: bheda ātma bhūta tvāt anvaya ādīnā bhedāḥ eva ekaḥ vītaḥ syāt

original: na ca kaścidityādinā- ye bhedānāṁ nirvartakāḥ pradhānadharmāḥ te tadgamyāḥ ekatvādivat |
analyzed: na ca kaścid ityādinā ye nirvartakāḥ pradhāna dharmāḥ te tad gamyāḥ ekatva ādi vat
tathā ca niravayava amūrta tva ādayaḥ

original: tathā ye pradhānena nirvartyā bhedadharmāḥ te tasya gamakāḥ anvayādivat |
analyzed: tathā ye pradhānena nirvartyāḥ bheda dharmāḥ te tasya gamakāḥ anvaya ādi vat

original: ta- thā ca sattvavibhutvādaya iti svabhāvaprasaṅgadvayamāha ||
analyzed: ta thā ca sattva vibhu tva ādayaḥ iti svabhāva prasaṅga dvayam āha

original: nanu yadyapi sarvathā nimittanaimittikabhāvaḥ tathāpi tathā'niśca- yān na sarvathā gamyagamakatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
analyzed: nanu yadi api sarvathā nimitta naimittika bhāvaḥ tathā api na sarvathā gamya gamaka tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: sāmānyataḥ khalvapi pratyakṣaṁ cānavadhāritaṁ cārthaṁ viśeṣadarśanād viśeṣeṇa pratipadyata ityādivaca- nāl liṅgajñānasya niścayātmakasyeṣṭatvādaniścitābhimatānāṁ  #
analyzed: sāmānyatas khalu api viśeṣa darśanāt viśeṣeṇa pratipadyate iti ādi vaca nāt liṅga jñānasya niścaya ātmakasya iṣṭa tvāt aniścita abhimata
ca liṅga dharmāṇām ananya tvāt anuttaram etat

original: (104) syādetat- iṣyata eva tathā gamyagamakabhāva ityāha - bhedānā- mityādi |
analyzed: syāt etat iṣyate eva tathā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ iti āha bhedānām ityādi

original: yasmādanvayādaya eva śāstre hetutvena gṛhyante na tu sanmā- trādayaḥ pradhānasya cāstitvādaya eva sādhyatvena na tu niravayavatvā- dayaḥ tasmān  #
analyzed: yasmāt anvaya ādayaḥ eva śāstre hetu tvena gṛhyante na tu sanmātra ādayaḥ pradhānasya ca astitva ādayaḥ eva sādhyatvena na tu niravayava tva ādayaḥ tasmāt
nimitta naimittika bhāvaḥ pradhāna astitva ādi adhi gama hetuḥ

original: kathaṁ punaḥ pradhānasya niravayavatvam yāvatā sattvādayas tasyāva- yavāḥ santyeva |
analyzed: punar pradhānasya niravayava tvam yāvatā sattva ādayaḥ yavāḥ santi eva
tad vyatirikta avayava abhāvāt niravayava tvam iti adoṣaḥ
daśa cūlikā arthāḥ iti
astitvam eka tvam atha arthavat tva pārārthyam anya tvam akartṛ bhāvaḥ

analyzed: liṅgyate iti gamyate iti arthaḥ na atra upacāraḥ yuktaḥ iti upacāra nibandhanasya abhāvāt
atha ityādi

original: yo hi kiñcit kāraṇamupajanita- kāryaṁ dṛṣṭvānyadapi tajjātīyaṁ paśyan sādṛśyaskhalitamatiretadapi ni- yataṁ tat kāryaṁ janayiṣyatītyadhyavasyati  #
analyzed: yaḥ hi kiñcid kāraṇam upajanita kārya dṛṣṭvā anyat api tad jātīya paśyan sādṛśya skhalita matiḥ etat api ni tat kārya janayiṣyati iti adhyavasyati

kadācid iti vacanāt na bhavati api

original: yasmāt kadācin na bhavati tasmād vyabhicārītyucyate |
analyzed: yasmāt kadācid na bhavati tasmāt vyabhicāri iti ucyate

original: naiva hi sa tadānumānamiti yo'sāvayathārthaḥ pratyayaḥ |
analyzed: na eva hi sa tadā anumānam iti yaḥ u sau ayathārthaḥ pratyayaḥ
atas tad kāraṇe na anumāna upacāraḥ te

original: ato nāsti tade- kam yadanumānaṁ syād vyabhicāri ca ||
analyzed: atas na asti syāt vyabhicāri ca

original: tathā hi- vaktāro bhavanti - yadanenānumānamupanyastam tan mayā dūṣitamityapi ca- vyabhicārīti |

original: yadi kāryakāraṇajñāne satyapi punas tato'dhikaṁ vya- bhicāryavyabhicāritvamapekṣyate sambandhāntaramāgatamityabhyupeta- hānam ||
analyzed: yadi kārya kāraṇa jñāne sati api punar vya bhicāri avyabhicāri tvam apekṣyate sambandha antaram āgatam iti abhyupeta hānam
yasya eva avyabhicāri tā apekṣyate iti yasya eva avyabhicāri tā svarūpam apekṣyate iti arthaḥ

yatas vinābhāvi tvasya na anya avyabhicāri tā asti tasya avyabhicāri tā rūpa tvāt

original: atha niyamārthaṁ tad vacanam evamapi - sāmānyataḥ khalvapītyāderānarthakyaṁ syā- t ||

original: kāryakāraṇasambandhe hyanumitihetutvenābhyupete liṅgasvarūpameva vicāra- yituṁ yuktam - kimidaṁ kāryaṁ syān na syāditi |
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa sambandhe hi anumiti hetu tvena abhyupete liṅga svarūpam eva vicāra yitu yuktam kim idam kārya syāt na syāt iti
tat yathā nadī pūraḥ iti

original: tatra hi svarūpagata eva vicāraḥ - kimayaṁ nadīpūro vṛṣṭikṛta āhosvin neti |
analyzed: tatra hi sva rūpa gataḥ eva vicāraḥ kim aya nadī pūraḥ vṛṣṭi kṛtaḥ āhosvit na iti

original: yadā tvasau phenakalilapāṁsulodakādibhiś cihnair niścitasvarūpo bhavati tadā na punaravyabhicāritve vicāramapekṣyate |
analyzed: yadā tu asau phena kalila pāsula udaka ādibhiḥ cihnaiḥ niścita svarūpaḥ bhavati tadā na punar avyabhicāri tve vicāram apekṣyate

original: na hi vṛṣṭikāryatve niścite tatra vyabhicāritvamāśaṅkyate kāryasya kāra- ṇāvyabhicārāt |
analyzed: na hi vṛṣṭi kārya tve niścite tatra vyabhicāri tvam āśaṅkyate kāryasya kāra ṇa avyabhicārāt

original: nanu ca naivamavadhāryate - sāmānyato dṛṣṭamevātīndriyārthadarśana- heturiti kathaṁ tarhi - sāmānyato dṛṣṭamatīndriyārthopalabdhihetureveti

na etat asti

original: sarveṣāṁ hyanumānānāmapratyakṣādhigamahetutvāt sāmānyato dṛṣṭasyāpi tadadhigamahetutvaprāptau punarvacane tadviparītapratiṣedharupo ni- yamo  #

original: vijñāyate pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā iti yadvat |

anumāna dvayāt ca sāmānyatas pṛthakkṛtya atīndriya artha adhigama hetu tvena upādīyate

original: tad yathā - kṛṣṇā gavāṁ sampannakṣīrata- meti kṛṣṇāyā eva sampannakṣīratamatvam ||

original: tadbhāvamātre- ṇa hi pradhānaṁ bhedahetuḥ naikatvādibhir dharmaiḥ |

original: hyupajanaḥ pratiṣidhyate vikāraṇām- nedaṁ vyaktamasata utpadyata iti |

original: sadrūpānuvidhā- nāc ca bhedānāṁ sadrūpameva kāraṇam |

rijñānam eva a sūtraṇa hetuḥ avyavahitaḥ ucyeta pramāṇa parijñāna hetuḥ na uktaḥ syāt

ādi śabdena pūrvavat ādayaḥ nai yāyika uktāḥ gṛhyante

original: tatretyādinā - samavāyādīnāṁ tadvatāṁ ca sama- vāyyādīnāṁ samavāyasamavāyyādirūpeṇāpratyakṣatvābhyupagamāt parama- tenāpi tadāśrayasyānumānasya  #
analyzed: tatra ityādinā samavāya ādīnā tadvatā ca sama vāyi ādīnā samavāya samavāyi ādi rūpeṇa apratyakṣa tva abhyupagamāt parama tena api tad āśrayasya anumānasya
pratyakṣa pūrvaka tva na asti iti darśayati
tad matena tu iti
tad mata grahaṇam sva matena sayoga sayoginoḥ api apra tyakṣa tvāt
tat abhyupetya iti
tad mata tad śabdena sambadhyate
na hetuḥ anumāyāḥ ca iti

original: caśabdo bhinnakramo'vadhāraṇārthaś ca draṣṭavyaḥ naiva heturityarthaḥ ||
analyzed: caśabdaḥ bhinnakramaḥ uvadhāraṇa arthaḥ ca draṣṭavyaḥ na eva hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
dvayoḥ aviśeṣāt ityādi
dvayoḥ api sambandhinoḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ sayogaḥ

original: tataś cobhayorapyagnidhūmayor gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt sarvathā ca sarvātmanā saṁyogāt ||
analyzed: tatas ca ubhayoḥ api agni dhūmayoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt sarvathā ca sarva ātmanā sayogāt
sayoginau ca na
sva rūpeṇa adhigantavyau iti
sva rūpam gṛhyate dhūma ādi rūpam
tena na adhigamana arhau
kasmāt iti āha na hi anumāne ityādi

original: sambandhirūpeṇa tarhi ta- yor adhigatayorupakāro bhaviṣyatītyāha- na cetyādi |
analyzed: sambandhi rūpeṇa tarhi ta yoḥ adhigatayoḥ upakāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha na ca ityādi

original: na hī- ndriyadhiyo yogo viṣayo nāpi tadyuta ityanena - saṁyogirūpeṇa saṁyoginoḥ pratyakṣatā na bhavatītyuktam ||
analyzed: na hi indriya dhiyaḥ yogaḥ viṣayaḥ nā api tad yutaḥ iti anena sayogi rūpeṇa sayoginoḥ pratyakṣa tā na bhavati iti uktam
syāt etat na nāma pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam anumāna ādīnām

original: lakṣaṇaṁ tu te - ṣāṁ yadiṣṭam tadanavadyam yatas tasya pratiṣedho nocyata ityāha- anumānopadeśopamānāmityādi |
analyzed: tu te yat iṣṭam tat anavadyam yatas tasya pratiṣedhaḥ na ucyate iti āha anumāna upadeśa upamānām ityādi

original: kathaṁ punaḥ svābhiprāyeṇa nokta- mityāha- sambandhāntarasyānirdeśāditi |
analyzed: punar sva abhiprāyeṇa na ukta miti āha sambandha antarasya anirdeśāt iti

original: na hi vaiśeṣikādyabhima- tasambandhebhyo'nyaḥ kaścana sambandho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: na hi vaiśeṣika ādi abhima ta sambandhebhyaḥ nyaḥ kaścana sambandhaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ

original: yadapīdaṁ śabareṇa svābhiprāyeṇa kilānumānamuktam - anumānaṁ jñātasambandhasyaikadeśa- darśanādekadeśāntare'sannikṛṣṭe buddhiḥ |
analyzed: yat api idam śabareṇa sva abhiprāyeṇa kila anumānam uktam anumāna jñāta sambandhasya eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare sannikṛṣṭe buddhiḥ
tat dvividha pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa sambandha

original: sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṁ ceti tadapi vaiśeṣikīyānumānameva yadi ta eva sa- mbandhā vivakṣitāḥ |
analyzed: sāmānyatas tat api vaiśeṣikīya anumānam eva yadi te eva vivakṣitāḥ

original: athānye teṣāṁ svarūpaṁ na nirdiṣṭamityanirdiṣṭame- vānumānam |
analyzed: atha anye teṣām svarūpa na nirdiṣṭam iti anirdiṣṭam e vā anumānam

original: smṛtirapi caikadeśadarśanādekadeśāntare pūrvādhigate jāya- ta iti sāpyanumānaṁ syāt |
analyzed: smṛtiḥ api ca eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare pūrva adhigate iti sā api anumāna syāt
sambandhaḥ api na indriya grāhyaḥ iti uktam
tat kutas tasya pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa sambandha tā iti ayuktam etat

original: arthāpattyabhavayos tu pratiṣedha ucyata iti tayoḥ svābhiprā- yeṇa vidhānāt ||
analyzed: arthāpatti abhavayoḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate iti tayoḥ sva abhiprā yeṇa vidhānāt
sthālī ādi adhiśrayaṇa ādi artha gṛhītam iti

original: ekenādiśabdena cūrṇīda- rvyādayaḥ sādhanaviśeṣā gṛhyante dvitīyena codakopasaṁhārādayo vyā- pāraviśeṣāḥ |
analyzed: ekena ādi śabdena cūrṇī da rvī ādayaḥ sādhana viśeṣāḥ gṛhyante dvitīyena ca udaka upasahāra ādayaḥ vyā pāra viśeṣāḥ
artha gṛhīta tva tu pākasya tatas utpatteḥ

original: na hi tair vi- nā pākaniṣpattir bhavati |
analyzed: na hi taiḥ vi nā pāka niṣpattiḥ bhavati
tatas nyathā anupapattyā tat sarvam artha gṛhīta meva

original: kathaṁ punaranumānam yāvatā trirūpāl liṅgato'rthadṛg anu- mānamuktamityāha- pacatiliṅgādeva gamyata iti |
analyzed: katha punar anumānam yāvatā trirūpāt anu mānam uktam iti āha pacati liṅgāt eva gamyate iti
pākaḥ eva hi sthālī ādīnām avinābhāva tvāt liṅgam
avinābhāvaḥ tu tatas utpa tteḥ
tatas dhūmāt agni anumāna vat liṅga ja tvāt anumānāt na bhidyate

original: (124) anye tu bhāvābhāvābhyāṁ kāryakāraṇapratipattimarthāpattim iccha- nti tāmevānye yuktyākhyaṁ pramāṇāntaramiti |
analyzed: anye tu bhāva abhāvābhyā kārya kāraṇa pratipattim arthāpattim icchanti tām eva anye pramāṇa antaram iti

original: yathā sati cakṣuṣi ca- kṣurvijñānaṁ bhavati asati na bhavati |
analyzed: yathā sati cakṣuṣi ca kṣuḥ vijñāna bhavati asati na bhavati
tasmāt cakṣuḥ eva tasya kāra ṇam iti
na hi idam anumāna yujyate dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt
pramāṇa antara si ddhaḥ hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati
na ca atra pramāṇa antareṇa dṛṣṭānta siddhiḥ

original: tathā hi - yadapīdaṁ bījāṅkurādi dṛṣṭāntatveneṣyate tatrāpyanenaiva siddhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tathā hi bīja aṅkura ādi dṛṣṭānta tvena iṣyate tatra api anena eva siddhaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: na caitad yuktam yenaiva sādhyaṁ sādhyate tenaiva dṛ- ṣṭānto'pīti nidarśanānavasthāprasaṅgāditi |
analyzed: na ca etat yuktam yena eva sādhya sādhyate tena eva dṛ ṣṭāntaḥ api iti nidarśana anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti
sā api na eva pramāṇa antaram
na hi atra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sādhyate sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhedāt
na hi bhāva abhāvābhyām anyaḥ hetu phala bhāvaḥ

original: na ca tenaiva tasya sādhyatvamupapa- dyate |
analyzed: na ca tena eva tasya sādhya tvam upapa dyate

original: tasmādatra mūḍhaṁ prati jananakhyātyā pitṛtvavad viṣayadarśanene vi- ṣayiṇo vṛttasambandhasya smaraṇād vyavahāraḥ sādhyate |
analyzed: tasmāt atra mūḍha prati janana khyātyā pitṛ tva vat viṣaya darśanena vi ṣayiṇaḥ vṛtta sambandhasya smaraṇāt vyavahāraḥ sādhyate

original: yādṛśe viṣaye tvayānyatra kāryakāraṇavyavahāraḥ pravartitaḥ tādṛśa evāyam |
analyzed: yādṛśe viṣaye tvayā anyatra kārya kāraṇa vyavahāraḥ pravartitaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva ayam
tasmāt trā api sa pravartyatām iti

original: vyavahāre ca sādhye sambhavati dṛṣṭānta itya- numānameva |
analyzed: vyavahāre ca sādhye sambhavati dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti a numānam eva

original: prayogas tu- yatra tadbhāvabhāvitvam tatra kāryakāraṇavya- vahāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu yatra tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tatra kārya kāraṇa vya vahāraḥ kartavyaḥ

original: tad yathā yatra pūrvaṁ pravartitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo bī- jāṅkurādau |
analyzed: tat yathā yatra pravartitaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ja aṅkura ādau
tad bhāva bhāvi tva ca cakṣuḥ vijñānayoḥ iti svabhāvaḥ

original: (125) śabaras tvāha- arthāpattirapi dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho'nyathā nopapadyata ityarthaparikalpanā yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhādarśanena bahirbhāva-  #
analyzed: śabaraḥ tu āha arthāpattiḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ anyathā na upapadyate iti artha parikalpanā yathā jīvati devadatte gṛha adarśanena
syāḥ adṛṣṭasya kalpanā iti

original: atra gobalīvardanyāyena śabdādavagatasya śru- taśabdena pṛthagupādānād dṛṣṭaśabdaḥ pramāṇāntaropalabdhe vartate |
analyzed: atra go balīvarda nyāyena śabdāt avagatasya śru ta śabdena pṛthak upādānāt dṛṣṭa śabdaḥ pramāṇa antara upalabdhe vartate
yathā jīvati iti abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ arthāpatteḥ udāharaṇam

original: gṛhādarśanena bahirbhā- vasyeti jīvato devadattasya gṛhādarśanamabhāvapramāṇopalabdhaṁ bahirbhāva- mantareṇa nopapadyata ityarthaḥ ||
analyzed: gṛha adarśanena bahirbhāvasya iti jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛha adarśanam abhāva pramāṇa upalabdha bahirbhāvam antareṇa na upapadyate iti arthaḥ

original: atra yadi jīvato devadattasya gṛhādarśanaṁ bahirbhāvādanyathā na dṛ- śyata ityanyathā nopapadyata ityucyate evaṁ sati bahirbhāvāavinābhūta-  #
analyzed: atra yadi jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛha adarśana bahirbhāvāt anyathā na dṛ śyate iti anyathā na upapadyate iti ucyate eva sati

original: mapi tan na dṛṣṭamiti tathāpi nopapadyate |
analyzed: tat na dṛṣṭam iti tathā api na upapadyate

original: atha jīvato devadattasya gṛ- hādarśanaṁ bahirbhāva eva sati dṛṣṭaṁ tadabhāve ca na dṛṣṭamityanyathā nopapa- dyata ityabhidhīyate tadā tadbhāvabhāvitvamevānyathānupapannatvamuktaṁ  #
analyzed: atha jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛ ha adarśana bahirbhāve eva sati dṛṣṭa tad abhāve ca na dṛṣṭam iti anyathā na upapadyate iti abhidhīyate tadā tad bhāva bhāvi tvam eva anyathā anupapanna tvam ukta
syāt
tat ca anvaya vyatirekiṇī eva arthe bhavati iti na arthāpattiḥ anumānāt bhidyate

original: prayogas tu- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto gṛhe na dṛśyate jīvati ca sa bahir bhavati |
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ gṛhe na dṛśyate jīvati ca sa bahis bhavati
yathā yathā ukta prakāraḥ bahis upalabhyamānaḥ yajñada ttaḥ

original: yathoktadharmakaś ca śabdāvagatasattāko devadatta iti svabhāvaḥ ||
analyzed: yathā ukta dharmakaḥ ca śabda avagata sattākaḥ devadattaḥ iti svabhāvaḥ
saśaya kāraṇa tvāt iti

original: yat saṁśayakāraṇam na tat pramāṇam prameyatvavat |
analyzed: yat saśaya kāraṇam na tat pramāṇam prameya tva vat
tathā ca prakrānta artha āpattiḥ iti vyāpaka viruddham āha
gehe bhāvāt na caitrasya ityādi

original: na hi gehe'bhāvamātreṇa caitrasya bahirbhāvapratītir bhavati anyathā śaśaviṣāṇasyāpi syāt |
analyzed: na hi gehebhāva mātreṇa caitrasya bahirbhāva pratītiḥ bhavati anyathā śaśa viṣāṇasya api syāt

original: geha- śabdas tu tatra vākye prayuktas tasya bahirbhāvaṁ gamayati ||
analyzed: geha śabdaḥ tu tatra vākye prayuktaḥ tasya bahirbhāva gamayati

original: gehaśabdasya prayoge hi vākyametan niyamavantamabhāvaṁ khyāpayati tathāvidhārthavivakṣāyāmevaivaṁvidhavākyaprayogāt |
analyzed: geha śabdasya prayoge hi vākyam etat niyamavantam abhāva khyāpayati tathāvidha artha vivakṣāyām eva evavidha vākya prayogāt

original: yadāha- yadi tu gehe bahiś ca na syāt nāstītyevocyeteti |
analyzed: yat āha yadi tu gehe bahis ca na syāt na asti iti eva ucyeta iti

original: tasmād vākyametadubha- yamākṣipati gehābhāvaṁ ca bahirbhāvaṁ ca ekasyāpi niyamayogakhyāpa- kasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt |
analyzed: tasmāt vākyam etat ubha yam ākṣipati geha abhāva ca bahirbhāva ca ekasya api niyama yoga khyāpa kasya dvitīya ākṣepa nāntarīyaka tvāt

original: na tu kevalo'bhāvo bahirbhāvamā- kṣipati niyamavāṁś ca na kevalaḥ niyamasyobhayarūpatvāt |
analyzed: na tu kevalaḥ bhāvaḥ bahirbhāvam ā kṣipati niyama vāḥ ca na kevalaḥ niyamasya ubhaya rūpa tvāt

original: tasmān nāsti gehe caitra iti nābhava evocyate api tu bahiś ca bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tasmāt na asti gehe caitraḥ iti na abhavaḥ eva ucyate api tu bahis ca bhāvaḥ
tasmāt arthāpattiḥ eva abhāvaḥ iti

original: yathā hi sthālyādikamantareṇa pāka- sya niṣpattir na bhavatīti nāntarīyakatvāt sā tadākṣipati evaṁ pra- tiṣedhaniyamavivakṣāyāṁ gṛhaśabdasya  #
analyzed: yathā hi sthālī ādikam antareṇa niṣpattiḥ na bhavati iti nāntarīyaka tvāt sā tat ākṣipati eva pra tiṣedha niyama vivakṣāyāḥ gṛha śabdasya

original: prayogo bahirbhāvamantareṇa na bhava- tīti nāntarīyakatvāt sa tamākṣipati |
analyzed: prayogaḥ bahirbhāvam antareṇa na bhava ti iti nāntarīyaka tvāt sa tam ākṣipati

original: tataś ca yathā pacatiḥ sthā- lyāder liṅgam evamevaṁvidhavākyasamavāyī gehaśabdo'pi bahirbhāva- syeti tata eva tadgatiḥ ||
analyzed: tatas ca yathā pacatiḥ sthā lī ādeḥ liṅgam evam evavidha vākya samavāyī geha śabdaḥ api bahis bhāva tatas eva tad gatiḥ

original: (127) śabaras tvāha - abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvo nāstītyarthasyāsannikṛ- ṣṭasyeti |
analyzed: śabaraḥ tu āha abhāvaḥ api pramāṇa abhāvaḥ na asti iti arthasya asannikṛ ṣṭasya iti
pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvaḥ indriyeṇa asat nikṛṣṭasya arthasya na asti iti abhāve niścaya hetuḥ bhavati
tasmāt abhāvaḥ pramāṇam iti vā kyā arthaḥ

original: tamevānye'nupalabdhiśabdena vyapadiśantaḥ pramāṇāntaravādina ā- huḥ- upalabdhyā yayā yo'rtho jñāyate tadabhāvataḥ |
analyzed: tam eva anyena upalabdhi śabdena vyapadiśantaḥ pramāṇa antara vādinaḥ ā huḥ upalabdhyā yayā yaḥ ṛthaḥ jñāyate tad abhāvataḥ
jñāyate tasya anupalabdhiḥ iya matā
iti
atra api na bhavati

original: atha grahaṇāpekṣaḥ sa vastvabhāvagrahaṇe vyāpriyate anavasthā syāt |
analyzed: atha grahaṇa apekṣaḥ sa vastu abhāva grahaṇe vyāpriyate anavasthā syāt

original: yathā hi ghaṭābhāvaḥ pramāṇābhāvena gṛhyate tathā pramāṇābhāvo'pyapare- ṇa so'pyapareṇetyanavasthitiḥ |
analyzed: yathā hi ghaṭa abhāvaḥ pramāṇa abhāvena gṛhyate tathā pramāṇa abhāvaḥ api apare na saḥ api apareṇa iti anavasthitiḥ

original: ekasyāpi cāgrahaṇe sarveṣāmagrahaṇa- miti kutas tasya prāmāṇyam |
analyzed: ekasya api ca agrahaṇe sarveṣām agrahaṇam iti kutas tasya prāmāṇyam

original: agṛhītasyāpīndriyavad grahaṇakāra- ṇatvaṁ syāditi cet na abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇatvāt |
analyzed: agṛhītasya api indriya vat syāt iti ced na abhāvasya sarva sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: (128) anyathā bhāva eva syāt arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇatvād bhāvasyeti nābhāvaḥ pramāṇam ||
analyzed: anyathā bhāvaḥ eva syāt artha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt bhāvasya iti na abhāvaḥ pramāṇam

original: tavāpi tarhyanupalabdhir na syāt pramāṇaṁ yathoktādeva doṣāt |
analyzed: tava api tarhi anupalabdhiḥ na syāt pramāṇa yathā uktāt eva doṣāt

original: naita- dasti na hi mayaivaṁvidhānupalabdhiriṣyate api tu upalabdhilakṣaṇa- prāptasyānupalabdhiḥ |
analyzed: na hi mayā evavidhā anupalabdhiḥ iṣyate api tu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ

original: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirupalambhapratyayāntarasāka- lyaṁ svabhāvaviśeṣaś ca yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati
analyzed: upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptiḥ upalambha pratyaya antara sāka lya svabhāva viśeṣaḥ ca yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsu anyeṣu upalambha pratyayeṣu san pratyakṣaḥ eva bhavati

original: tatropalabdhiḥ kartṛsthā vā kriyā syāt karmasthā vā |
analyzed: tatra upalabdhiḥ kartṛ sthā vā kriyā syāt karma sthā vā
pūrva kalpaḥ upalabhamānasya dharmaḥ jñānam upalabdhiḥ
tatonya upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ vivakṣita upalabdheḥ anya tvāt abhakṣya asparśanīya vat

original: yadā tu karmasthā kriyopalabdhiśabdenocyate tadopalabhyamānasyaiva dharmaḥ svaviṣayajñānajananayogyatālakṣaṇa upalabdhir viṣayasvabhāva eva  #
analyzed: yadā tu karma sthā kriyā upalabdhi śabdena ucyate tadā upalabhyamānasya eva dharmaḥ sva viṣaya jñāna janana yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ upalabdhiḥ viṣaya svabhāvaḥ eva
yogyatāyāḥ bhāva rūpa tvāt
tasmāt anyaḥ upalambha yogyaḥ eva tad eka jñā na sasṛṣṭa svabhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ

original: sa cāyaṁ yathopavarṇito dviprakāro'pya- nupalambhaḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva sidhyatīti nāsmākaṁ yathoktadoṣasambhavaḥ ||
analyzed: sa ca ayam yathā upavarṇitaḥ dvi prakāraḥ api anupalambhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva sidhyati iti na asmāka yathā ukta doṣa sambhavaḥ
bhavatu nāma evavidhā anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇam
sā punar katham anumānam
katha ca na syāt
dṛṣṭānta anapekṣaṇāt
na hi asyāḥ kaścid dṛṣṭāntaḥ sti
pramāṇa siddhaḥ hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati

original: anyathā yadyanupalabdhisiddha eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt evaṁ sati yathā ghaṭābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate tathā dṛṣṭānto'pi nirupākhyaṁ vyomakusumādyapareṇa  #
analyzed: anyathā yadi anupalabdhi siddhaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt eva sati yathā ghaṭa abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ api nirupākhya vyoma kusuma ādi apareṇa
dṛṣṭāntena sādhyeta
saḥ upi apareṇa iti anavasthā prasajyeta

original: atha dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭāntena vināpi sidhyati ghaṭābhāvo'pi sidhyet |
analyzed: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntena vinā api sidhyati ghaṭa abhāvaḥ api sidhyet

original: tataś ca pramāṇāntaramevānupala- bdhiḥ syāt dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇāditi ||
analyzed: tatas ca pramāṇa antaram eva anupala bdhiḥ syāt dṛṣṭānta anapekṣaṇāt iti
na eṣa doṣaḥ
na hi apalambhena abhāvaḥ sādhyate
ki tarhi
abhāva vya vahāraḥ
hi asat vyavahārasya upalabhya anupalabdhiḥ

original: sā svasannidhā- nāt svanimittamenaṁ sādhayatīti svanimittasāmagrībhāvī sarve'tra dṛ- ṣṭāntaḥ |
analyzed: sā sva sannidhā sva nimittam ena sādhayati iti sva nimitta sāmagrī bhāvī sarvetra dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: sadvyavahārapratiṣedhe'pi sādhye dṛśyānupalabdhyetarayā ca ni- mittavaikalyābhāvino'ṅkurādayo'pi dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kevalaṁ nirupākhya- meveti na  #
analyzed: sat vyavahāra pratiṣedhe api sādhye dṛśya anupalabdhyā itarayā ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kevala nirupākhya meva iti na

original: kiṁ punaḥ kāraṇamabhāva eva na sādhyate |
analyzed: ki punar kāraṇam abhāvaḥ eva na sādhyate
bheda abhāvāt

original: tathā hi- upalabdhireva dṛśyātmanāṁ sattā anupalabdhiś cāsattā |
analyzed: tathā hi upalabdhiḥ eva dṛśya ātmanā sattā anupalabdhiḥ ca asattā
katha kṛtvā

original: (130) yadā tāvad yathoktā svaviṣayajñānajananayogyatopalabdhiḥ tadā yo- gyatāyāḥ svabhāvabhūtatvādupalabdhiḥ satteti siddhametat |
analyzed: yadā tāvat yathā uktā sva viṣaya jñāna janana yogyatā upalabdhiḥ tadā yogyatāyāḥ svabhāva bhūta tvāt upalabdhiḥ sattā iti siddham etat

original: yadāpi kartṛ- dharmo jñānamupalabdhiḥ tadāpi sā dṛśyasyārthasya sattānibandhanatvāt tadvyāptyavyatirekābhyāṁ tatsvabhāvāviśiṣṭeti sattāvadupacārāt  #
analyzed: yadā api kartṛ dharmaḥ jñānam upalabdhiḥ tadā api sā dṛśyasya arthasya sattā nibandhana tvāt tad vyāpti avyatirekābhyā tad svabhāva aviśiṣṭā iti sattāvat upacārāt
sattā eva
tat evam ubhayathā api upalabdhiḥ sattā
tad abhāvaḥ ca asattā paryudāsa vṛttyā pūrvavat
sā eva ca anupalabdhiḥ iti na asti sādhya sādhanayoḥ bhedaḥ
tena na abhāvaḥ ūnupalabdhyā sādhyate

original: tasmān nimittopadarśanena nāstītya- nupalabdherasadvyavahāraḥ sādhyate muḍhaṁ prati jananakhyātyā pitṛtvavat |
analyzed: tasmāt nimitta upadarśanena na asti iti a nupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāraḥ sādhyate muḍha prati janana khyātyā pitṛ tva vat
adṛśya anupalambhena api nimitta abhāvāt vyavahāra pratiṣedha ajanana khyātyā pitṛ tva vat iti
yā atra parapakṣa pratiṣedhena ityādi

original: yaduktaṁ bhāṣyakāreṇa - parapakṣapra- tiṣedhena svapakṣasiddhiriti tatpratiṣedhaḥ sāṅkhyīyāvītapratiṣedhādeva kṛto veditavyaḥ ayamapyāvītaprayoga  #
analyzed: yat ukta bhāṣyakāreṇa parapakṣa pra tiṣedhena sva pakṣa siddhiḥ iti tad pratiṣedhaḥ sāṅkhyīya avīta pratiṣedhāt eva kṛtaḥ veditavyaḥ ayam api āvīta prayogaḥ
eva iti kṛtvā iti
dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ
